txt_en: A merry heart goes all the way.
txt_cn: 心旷神怡，事事顺利。

txt_en: When life gets you down, just keep moving.
txt_cn: 当生活遇到瓶颈，继续向前就对了。——《料理鼠王》

txt_en: The only way to fail is not to try.
txt_cn: 失败的唯一方式是不去尝试。

txt_en: Success depends on effort, not just desire.
txt_cn: 成功源于努力，而非渴望。

txt_en: The more that you read, the more things you will know.
txt_cn: 你读的书越多，你知道的事就越多。

txt_en: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
txt_cn: 不要等待机会，创造机会。

txt_en: Greatness comes from small, consistent efforts, not impulse.
txt_cn: 伟大源于微小坚持，而非冲动。

txt_en: You are beautiful just as you are.
txt_cn: 你本来就很美。

txt_en: Don't be afraid to be yourself. Follow your own path.
txt_cn: 不要害怕做与众不同的自己，走自己的路。

txt_en: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
txt_cn: 不要等到铁烫热再去打它，而是通过打它让铁变热。

txt_en: Hard work magnifies achievement’s joy.
txt_cn: 越努力，成就感越强。

txt_en: Don’t wish for it. Work for it.
txt_cn: 不要仅仅希望它，去为它努力。

txt_en: Challenges spark life; conquering them gives purpose.
txt_cn: 挑战点亮生活，征服赋予意义。

txt_en: True success inspires others to act.
txt_cn: 真正的成功是激励他人行动。

txt_en: To be a happy man.
txt_cn: 做一个幸福的人。

txt_en: Care and diligence bring luck.
txt_cn: 谨慎和勤奋，带来好运气。

txt_en: The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
txt_cn: 成功的关键是专注于目标，而非障碍。

txt_en: Don't limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
txt_cn: 不要限制你的挑战，挑战你的极限。

txt_en: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
txt_cn: 只有在字典里，成功才排在工作之前。

txt_en: Spring will come and so will happiness.
txt_cn: 春天会到来，幸福也会随之而来。

txt_en: Success is becoming the best version of yourself.
txt_cn: 成功是成为最好的自己。

txt_en: Every cloud has a silver lining.
txt_cn: 天无绝人之路。

txt_en: Time is a bird flying into eternity.
txt_cn: 时间是一只永远在飞翔的鸟。

txt_en: A winner is a dreamer who never gives up.
txt_cn: 一个成功者是一个永不放弃的梦想家。

txt_en: You can do anything, but not everything.
txt_cn: 你可以做任何事，但不是所有事。

txt_en: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
txt_cn: 我们唯一需要害怕的是害怕本身。

txt_en: Your greatest triumph is staying true to yourself.
txt_cn: 忠于自我是最高成就。

txt_en: Trailblaze where no path exists.
txt_cn: 在无路处开辟新径。

txt_en: A miss is as good as a mile.
txt_cn: 失之毫厘，差之千里。

txt_en: Happy life lies in a peaceful mind.
txt_cn: 幸福的生活存在于心绪的宁静之中。

txt_en: Cross oceans only by daring to leave shore.
txt_cn: 有离开海岸的勇气，才能横渡海洋。
